pages.title: Blessed Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of (relatively) peaceful mobs. List of valid mobs: Bears, Bees, Chickens, Cows, Frogs, Horses, Pigs, Sheeps, Squids, Turtles, Rabbits and all kinds of Fishes.
Complete the Catalyst by absorbing the correct souls, until the process is finished and the Catalyst appears.
When used in a Runic Artifact, a Blessed Catalyst produces Blessed Materia. Blessed Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into farming, fishing and breeding resources.
